text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 106233006 (Topographical modifier)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 272424004 (Relative sites)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    255503000Entire (qualifier value)

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in Laterality Qualifier Value Set

name: BodyLocationQualifierVS
title: Body Location Qualifier Value Set
description: Qualifiers to refine a body structure or location including qualifiers for relative location, directionality, number, and plane, and excluding qualifiers for laterality.
